title: Archive: Croatia v England - Euro 2004
body_text:
Archive: Croatia v England - Euro 2004
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Relive a great night for England as they beat Croatia 4-2 at Euro 2004 with Wayne Rooney scoring a brace to help Sven-Goran Eriksson's side progress through to the quarter-finals.
Watch Croatia v England from Euro 2004 in full on Tuesday 16 June, 2.15pm, on BBC Two and iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
